Enumerations

enum  ov_status_code_e {
  OV_SUCCESS = 0,
  OV_ERROR_UNKNOWN = -1,
  OV_RESPONSE_MISMATCH_ERROR = -2,
  OV_RESPONSE_FLAG_ERROR = -3,
  OV_RESPONSE_CLASS_ID_ERROR = -4,
  OV_RESPONSE_CMD_ID_ERROR = -5,
  OV_RESPONSE_DATA_PACKET_SIZE_ERROR = -6,
  OV_RESPONSE_INVALID_PARAM = -7,
  OV_RESPONSE_OUT_OF_RANGE_PARAM = -8,
  OV_RESPONSE_OUT_OF_RANGE_FWID = -9,
  OV_RESPONSE_UNKNOWN_ERROR = -10,
  INVALID_INPUT = -11,
  INVALID_GPIO_RESPONSE = -12,
  OV_FIRMWARE_DOWNLOAD_ERROR = -13,
  OV_FIRMWARE_FILE_OPRATION_ERROR = -14,
  OV_SMALL_BUFFER_SIZE = -15
}
 
enum  video_resolution {
  V_640_480,
  V_352_288,
  V_320_230,
  V_176_144,
  V_1280_720
}
 
enum  video_framerate {
  V_30FPS,
  V_20FPS,
  V_15FPS,
  V_5FPS
}
 
enum  video_bitrate {
  V_2Mbps,
  V_1Mbps,
  V_512kbps,
  V_128kbps
}
 
enum  sensor_frequency {
  V_AUTO,
  V_50HZ,
  V_60HZ
}
 
enum  audio_format {
  A_PCM,
  A_ADPCM,
  A_ULAW = 0x05
}
 
enum  audio_samplerate {
  A_44K,
  A_32K,
  A_24K,
  A_16K,
  A_12K,
  A_11K,
  A_8K
}
 
enum  ov_q_msgs {
  NO_MESSAGE,
  OV_TI_GPIO_HIGH,
  OV_TI_GPIO_LOW,
  TIMEROUT_EVENT
}

Detailed Description

Macro Definition Documentation

#define ov_CloseFwFile   sl_CloseFile

Close the opened file.

Parameters
[in]fHdl: File handler for the opened file
Returns
0 on success, negative error-code on error
Note
#define ov_GetData   sl_GetData

Get the data from the file.

Parameters
[in]fHdl: File handler
[out]fHdl: Pointer to the buffer for reading data
[in]length: Size of the data to be read
[in]offset: Offset location for the data to be read
Returns
0 on success, negative error-code on error
Note
#define ov_GetFwSize   sl_GetFileSize

Get the size of the file.

Parameters
[in]fName: Pointer to file name to be opened
[out]fHdl: Size of the file
Returns
0 on success, negative error-code on error
Note
#define ov_OpenFwFile   sl_OpenFile

Open the file containing the firmware. This file is programmed on CC3200's NVM.

Parameters
[in]fName: Pointer to file name to be opened
[out]fHdl: File handler for the opened file
Returns
0 on success, negative error-code on error
Note

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct ov_a_config ov_a_config_s
typedef enum audio_format ov_a_format_e

Represents 'Param0' of 'AENC_setformat' Refer 'SIF Protocol' document

typedef enum audio_samplerate ov_a_samplerate_e

Represents 'Param0' of 'AENC_setsamplerate' Refer 'SIF Protocol' document

Response for 'ASTREAM_Getinfo' Refer 'SIF Protocol' document

Function Documentation

ov_s32 ov_config_a_codec ( ov_u16 const  fd,
ov_a_config_s const  config 
)

Configure the parameters for audio codec.

Parameters
[in]fd: Interface Descriptor
[in]config: Structure containing the different configuration parameter value
Returns
0 on success, negative error-code on error
Note
ov_s32 ov_config_a_status ( ov_u16 const  fd,
ov_u8 const  enable 
)

Enable/ Disable the audio status.

Parameters
[in]fd: Interface Descriptor
[in]enable: 1 Enable, 0 Disable
Returns
0 on success, negative error-code on error
Note
ov_s32 ov_config_v_encoder ( ov_u16 const  fd,
ov_v_resolution_e const  resolution,
ov_u8 const  enable 
)

Set resolution and enable/disable the video sampling.

Parameters
[in]fd: Interface Descriptor
[in]resolution: Video resolution value (Enum)
[in]enable: Enable(1)/Disable(0) video sampleling
Returns
0 on success, negative error-code on error
Note
ov_s32 ov_config_v_sensor ( ov_u16 const  fd,
ov_v_config_s const  config 
)

Configures the bringhtness, contrast, saturation, mode and other parameters for the video sensor.

Parameters
[in]fd: Interface Descriptor
[in]config: Structure containing the different configuration parameter value
Returns
0 on success, negative error-code on error
Note
ov_s32 ov_deinit ( )

Deinit the interface and OV.

Parameters
None
Returns
0 on success, negative error-code on error
Note
ov_s32 ov_get_astream_data ( ov_u16 const  descriptor,
ov_u32 const  pkt_size,
ov_u8 *const  p_outbuffer 
)

Get the audio data packet.

Parameters
[in]fd: Interface Descriptor
[in]pkt_size: Packet size to be recevied.
[out]p_outbuffer: Pointer to data buffer to recevie the audio data
Returns
0 on success, negative error-code on error
Note
ov_s32 ov_get_astream_info ( ov_u16 const  fd,
ov_u32 const  pkt_size,
ov_astream_info_s *const  p_astream_info 
)

Get the stream info for the next available audio stream packet.

Parameters
[in]fd: Interface Descriptor
[in]pkt_size: Maximum packet size that can be received by application. This value depend upon the app buffer for getting the audio data
[out]p_astream_info: Pointer to structure for the next audio packet info
Returns
0 on success, negative error-code on error
Note
This function should be called before calling the 'ov_get_astream_data'
ov_s32 ov_get_status ( ov_u16 const  fd,
ov_u8 const  out_buffer_size,
ov_u8 *  p_outbuffer,
ov_u8 *  p_length 
)

Initnialize the interface and config the OV788 system.

Parameters
[in]fd: Interface Descriptor
[in]out_buffer_size: Buffer length
[out]p_outbuffer: pointer to buffer containing the response
[out]p_length: Size of the data in buffer
Returns
0 on success, negative error-code on error
Note
ov_s32 ov_get_version ( ov_u16 const  fd,
ov_u8 const  out_buffer_size,
ov_u8 *  p_outbuffer,
ov_u8 *  p_length 
)

Initnialize the interface and config the OV788 system.

Parameters
[in]fd: Interface Descriptor
[in]out_buffer_size: Buffer length
[out]p_outbuffer: pointer to buffer containing the response
[out]p_length: Size of the data in buffer
Returns
0 on success, negative error-code on error
Note
ov_s32 ov_get_vstream_data ( ov_u16 const  fd,
ov_u32 const  pkt_size,
ov_u8 *const  p_outbuffer 
)

Get the Video data packet.

Parameters
[in]fd: Interface Descriptor
[in]pkt_size: Packet size to be recevied. This value should be same as 'v_nxt_pkt_size' in previous 'ov_get_vstream_info()' function call
[out]p_outbuffer: Pointer to data buffer to recevie the video data
Returns
0 on success, negative error-code on error
Note
ov_s32 ov_get_vstream_info ( ov_u16 const  fd,
ov_u32 const  pkt_size,
ov_vstream_info_s *const  p_vstream_info 
)

Get the stream info for the next available video stream packet.

Parameters
[in]fd: Interface Descriptor
[in]pkt_size: Maximum packet size that can be received by application. This value depend upon the app buffer for getting the video data
[out]p_vstream_info: Pointer to structure for the next video packet info
Returns
0 on success, negative error-code on error
Note
This function should be called before calling the 'ov_get_vstream_data'
ov_s32 ov_init ( )

Init the interface and configure the OV788 system.

Parameters
None
Returns
0 on success, negative error-code on error
Note

ov_v_bitrate_e const  bit_rate

[in]bit_rate: Bit rate rate Value (Enum)
Returns

[in]frame_rate: Frame rate Value (Enum)
Returns

ov_u8 const  enable 
)

Enable/ Disable the motion detect feature.

Parameters
[in]fd: Interface Descriptor
[in]enable: 1 Enable, 0 Disable
Returns
0 on success, negative error-code on error
Note
ov_s32 ov_set_sampling_rate ( ov_u16 const  fd,
ov_a_samplerate_e const  sampling_rate 
)

Configure the sampling rate for audio.

Parameters
[in]fd: Interface Descriptor
[in]sampling_rate: Sampling rate value
Returns
0 on success, negative error-code on error
Note
ov_s32 ov_set_zoom ( ov_u16 const  fd,
ov_u8 const  zoom 
)

Set the Zoom in and out for the sensor.

Parameters
[in]fd: Interface Descriptor
[in]zoom: Set zoom value (0 zoom in, 1 zoom out)
Returns
0 on success, negative error-code on error
Note
